title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Program Manager
description: The uCIFI Program Manager describes the scheduling capabilities of the device, referring to Program Schedulers, Program Functions, Calendar Rules and Filters.. objectID:'3457'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3457'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'1.0'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Program Manager`.

Max number of Program Schedulers.description:
Property. Maximum number of program schedulers supported by the device.
Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.. resourceID:'0'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Error Conditions.description:
Property. Bitmap
Bit 0: No valid program 
Bit 1: Missing configuration objects 
Bit 2: Missing configuration resources 
Bit 3: Invalid inputs
Bit 4: Invalid outputs
Bit 5: Invalid function format
Bit 6: Out of storage memory
Bit 7: Out of runtime memory
Bit 8..31: reserved for future use. resourceID:'11'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

Clear errors.description:
Property. When executed, clears temporary error conditions.
To be noted that some of the errors may require to change the content of other objects to be completely cleared. [Executable resource]. resourceID:'12'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Supported Capabilities.description:
Property. Bitmap
Bit 0: Astronomical Events
Bit 1: Single sensor Inputs
Bit 2: Multi Sensor Inputs
Bit 3: Input Filters
Bit 4: Output Filters
Bit 5: Calendar
Bit 6: Compound Operations
Bit 7: Second granularity (for fixed time expressions)
Bit 8: Astronomical Midnight
Bit 9: Off when inactive. resourceID:'13'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
